description.appearance: Greenish body with a broad, dark horizontal stripe along the flank. Large mouth extends past the eye.

behavior.spawn_habitat: Shallow, sandy or gravel beds near shore
behavior.summer_behavior: Seeks shade or deeper, cooler water during heat; active during low-light hours
behavior.winter_behavior: Moves to deeper water, slower metabolism, less active
behavior.feeding_patterns: Most active at dawn and dusk; opportunistic ambush predator

weather_reaction.cold_front: Moves deeper, less active, slower bite
weather_reaction.warm_trend: More active, moves shallow, increased feeding
weather_reaction.high_pressure: Active in shallows, especially near cover
weather_reaction.rain: Feeds near inflows and muddy water, increased activity
weather_reaction.wind: Wind-blown banks and points attract baitfish and bass

strategies.method: Cast parallel to vegetation edges and over submerged grass beds. Use slow, steady retrieves.
Target areas near inflows and cover. Fish slow and close to structure.
Fish around submerged structures and drop-offs. Use erratic retrieves to trigger strikes.
Fish shallow flats and points. Use noisy lures to attract bass in low visibility.
Fish deep structure (ledges, drop-offs). Present lures slowly and close to the bottom.
Sight-fish for bass on beds in shallow water. Cast past the bed and drag lure through slowly.

notes: Best fishing months: February through May for trophy bass.
Practice catch and release for large, spawning females.
Use polarized sunglasses to spot fish and structure.
